attributes.action: give a knighthood to Ryan Giggs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ryan Giggs is a role model for millions of children, at a time where the nations most popular sport is devoid of role models, Ryan Giggs stands alone.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
